official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire land for inclusion in the Edwin B. Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Fisherman's Cove Protection Act of 1992 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire for inclusion in the Edwin B. Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge a parcel of land known as Fisherman's Cove in Monmouth County, New Jersey, and certain other lands.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire land for inclusion in the Edwin B. Forsythe National Wildlife Refuge.
